description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Rice Noodle Salad With Roasted Sesame Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Rice Noodle Salad With Roasted Sesame Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 spring onions, white parts finely sliced (green tops reserved)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the stock, water, spring onion tops, garlic and ginger in a saucepan. Bring to a simmer and add the chicken. Simmer for 5 minutes, then cover, remove from the heat and leave to continue cooking for a further 15 minutes. Transfer to a plate to cool, and then shred.
Cook the noodles as per the packet instructions. Drain and refresh under cold running water, then drain again.
Place the noodles, shredded chicken and all the vegetables into a large bowl. Add the roasted sesame dressing and toss so everything is coated evenly.
Top with the herbs, chilli and sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds.
